commandDescription: Runs a test and extracts limits information, optionally writing to a Salesforce org
nameFlagDescription: name to use when writing the limit object
namespaceFlagDescription: Namespace of the limits output (omit for default namespace)
writeFlagDescription: Write the limits information to Salesforce
runtestusernameFlagDescription: Username/alias to run the tests as (omit to use the same username as the -u/-a switch)
salesforceErrorWriting: Error writing the limit information to Salesforce - %s
